numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Some people are members of newer generations.
2. Some people are members of older generations.
3. Many members of newer generations think that the world is improving.
4. Many members of older generations think that the world is not improving.
5. Times have changed since older people grew up.
6. The world has not necessarily turned out as older people envisioned.
7. This situation can disappoint older people.
8. If older people are disappointed, then older people can believe that the world is getting worse.
9. I wonder how the graph may look in the future.
10. I wonder why the graph may look like that in the future.
